scripts.start: export NODE_ENV=production && export ENV=production && node app.js
scripts.dev: export NODE_ENV=development && export ENV=development && nodemon --inspect=0.0.0.0:9229 app.js --ignore './uploader/'
scripts.fake_dev: export NODE_ENV=development && export ENV=development && node app.js
scripts.publish: docker build . -t cmssw/runregistry-backend && docker push cmssw/runregistry-backend
scripts.docker_build: docker build . -f Dockerfile -t cmssw/runregistry-backend && docker build . -f DockerfilePingGUI -t cmssw/runregistry-workers-dqm-gui-pinging
scripts.push_docker_images: docker push cmssw/runregistry-backend & docker push cmssw/runregistry-workers-dqm-gui-pinging
